code_repairing_1:
The line of code with the bug is:

```csharp
foreach (CSProjectInfo project in orderedProjects.Select(t => t))
```
The bug is that the method `Select` is called on an IEnumerable and then immediately discarded. This is redundant and can be removed.

The fixed code is:

```csharp
foreach (CSProjectInfo project in orderedProjects)
```
